title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 486.1 - Who must pay and how much
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 486.1 - Who must pay and how much

State Regulations

Each person and public corporation required to obtain a
water transport fee for each intake facility equal to $100 per million gallons
of fresh water withdrawn or transported pursuant to such
permit. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
486.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
